name: Endless (Opoos)
description:
It's early 22nd centrury on Earth.

The world is ruled by an oppressive regime and you try to make a living as a Courier, whose job is to smuggle illegal cargo and uncensored data. For some reason a normal low-priority gig gains attention of all Citizen Supervision units.

Will you be able to escape?

Game features:

  • Test your skills in a challanging infinite-runner game!
  • Discover the city (and its history in the future)!
  • Unlock many suits and customize gameplay experience to your liking!
  • Track your achievements and share them with your friends!
